name: Kids Puzzle
description:
Your kids will keep playing these amazing puzzles for a long time and will definitely enjoy them a lot!

The kids will enjoy the new puzzle game while improving concentration skills. Kids will enjoy it more if you encourage them at the end of each puzzle by clapping hands.

Features:

* Fun, creative animal graphics that kids will love

* 18 different fun animal puzzles in 2 pieces and 18 animal puzzles in 3 pieces for your kid to choose their own difficulty!

* Fun encouraging moments at the end of each puzzle!

* Easy for kids to use and control.
